channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gate not secure, 23rd July
item.description:
The gate at the end of Gwydyr Rd that goes into Glassmill Pond is not secured. There is no council padlock. The padlock there is not in place properly so the gate can be pushed open. Have secured with cable ties as a temporary solution. Need bolt cutters to remove old padlock and attach a new council one.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gwydyr Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Approximately just off the turning into Mapesbury Road from Willesden Lane NW6. Right on the side of the "Sleeping Policeman" bump., 23rd July
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mapesbury Road, London
